description: Self-built OSINT analysis tools - no external APIs required

email.name: Email Intelligence
email.description: Self-built email analysis and pattern recognition

sources.name: Breach Pattern Analyzer
sources.description: Analyzes email patterns to predict breach likelihood using built-in algorithms

sources.name: Email Structure Analyzer
sources.description: Analyzes email structure, username patterns, and domain characteristics

sources.name: Domain Reputation Analyzer
sources.description: Analyzes domain reputation based on TLD, structure, and common patterns

sources.name: Domain Structure Analyzer
sources.description: Analyzes domain structure, TLD types, and subdomain patterns

sources.name: DNS Pattern Simulator
sources.description: Simulates DNS record patterns based on domain characteristics

sources.name: Subdomain Pattern Predictor
sources.description: Predicts likely subdomains based on domain patterns and common conventions

sources.name: Domain Age Estimator
sources.description: Estimates domain age and registration patterns based on structure analysis

username.name: Username Intelligence
username.description: Self-built username analysis and social presence prediction

sources.name: Username Pattern Analyzer
sources.description: Analyzes username characteristics and predicts platform presence

sources.name: Social Presence Predictor
sources.description: Predicts social media presence using probability modeling

sources.name: Username Variant Generator
sources.description: Generates likely username variations and alternatives

ip.name: IP Intelligence
ip.description: Self-built IP address analysis and geolocation prediction

sources.name: IP Pattern Analyzer
sources.description: Analyzes IP address patterns, classes, and characteristics

sources.name: Geolocation Predictor
sources.description: Predicts approximate location based on IP address patterns

sources.name: Network Range Analyzer
sources.description: Analyzes network ranges and predicts ISP characteristics

methodologies.patternRecognition: Analyzes input patterns to predict characteristics and behaviors
methodologies.probabilityModeling: Uses statistical models to predict likelihood of various outcomes
methodologies.structureAnalysis: Breaks down inputs into components for detailed analysis
methodologies.characteristicMapping: Maps input characteristics to known patterns and behaviors
